item.title: Roblox: Subway Mayhem Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Subway Mayhem Codes
  • How to Redeem Subway Mayhem Codes
  • How to Get More Subway Mayhem Codes

Subway Mayhem is one of the representatives of the battlegrounds genre. Therefore, your main task will be to fight other players and throw them out of the arena. And to make battles easier for beginners, the developers add various codes to Subway Mayhem .

By redeeming codes, you will receive free goodies, among which are credits, which are the main currency in this Roblox experience. For this money, you can purchase various customization options, as well as weapons. But hurry because after a certain time, each code expires and the reward becomes no longer available.

Updated August 17, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are several active codes for Subway Mayhem right now, each giving you a nice boost of Credits. These rewards can help you progress a little faster, so it’s a good idea to redeem them while they last. Since codes don’t stick around forever, you’ll want to grab them before they expire. More rewards may be added later, so checking back on this guide regularly is always worthwhile.

All Subway Mayhem Codes

Working Subway Mayhem Codes

  • PTSRELEASE - Redeem this code to get 1,000 Credits (NEW)
  • FREECASE - Redeem this code to get 1,500 Credits
  • DAILYREWARDS - Redeem this code to get 1,500 Credits

Expired Subway Mayhem Codes

There are no expired codes in Subway Mayhem . We will update this article as soon as more codes becomes available.

Like other representatives of the genre, Subway Mayhem offers you various maps on which you must fight to earn Credits. It is more difficult to do this than it seems, especially if your opponents are skilled players. Many attacks can stun you, which will allow others to either finish you off or throw you over the edge of the arena, so be prepared to spend a lot of time getting used to the combat system. Luckily, there is a way to slightly increase your survival chances, namely using Subway Mayhem codes.

These codes can contain various rewards, although most of them grant you money. For credits, you can buy weapons, such as grenades, to stun several opponents at once. However, we do not recommend delaying the use of Roblox codes, since their validity is limited.

How to Redeem Subway Mayhem Codes

To use Subway Mayhem codes, you only need to make a few clicks. This feature is no different from most other Roblox experiences. And for convenience, follow these steps:

  • First, launch Subway Mayhem .
  • Next, click on the tag icon. You will find it at the top of the screen, to the left of the AFK button.
  • After that, enter the code in the new window.
  • Finally, click the Check button to claim free goodies.

How to Get More Subway Mayhem Codes

To stay up to date with all active Subway Mayhem codes, you should bookmark this guide. We are going to update it over time, as well as our other Roblox articles. Alternatively, you can visit the official developer pages, where you will find all the news first-hand:

  • Daluest Studios Roblox group
  • Daluest Studios Discord server
Roblox

item.title: Roblox: Build a Golem Army Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Build a Golem Army is a fun Roblox game in the tycoon genre, but its gameplay is rich and offers a lot of opportunities for upgrades and battles. The essence of the game is to build your own army of golems to defend against enemies or even to raid other players' bases. By the way, you can take up a sword and fight side by side with your warriors. At the same time, you need to develop your mines, as they are your main source of income.

The game also features golem heroes with unique abilities, but you can only get them with a certain chance using spins. Fortunately, you can get spins and other rewards absolutely free if you redeem Build a Golem Army codes from our guide.

Updated August 17, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Right now, there’s one new code available, and it grants you some extra Spins to use. It’s a small reward, but still useful if you’re looking to boost your progress a bit. More codes may show up with future updates, so it’s worth keeping an eye on this guide. We’ll make sure to add any new freebies as soon as they become available.

All Build a Golem Army Codes

Working Build a Golem Army Codes

  • LuckySpin - Redeem this code to get Spins. (NEW)
  • RELEASE - Redeem this code to get 10 Spins.

Expired Build a Golem Army Codes

There are currently no expired codes for Build a Golem Army . You can redeem all codes and get rewards for them.

The rewards for redeeming Build a Golem Army codes will be useful regardless of whether you are a beginner or an experienced player. You can get hero spins for them. The more spins you have, the greater your chance of getting a rare hero, so hurry up and redeem your codes.

How to Redeem Codes in Build a Golem Army

In Build a Golem Army , as in many other Roblox games, you can easily find the option to use codes by exploring the game interface a little. However, if you are new to Roblox , you may need some help, so we have created a guide to show you how to use codes in Build a Golem Army .

  • Launch Roblox and open Build a Golem Army .
  • Look at the right side of the screen. Click on the white button with symbols.
  • Paste the code from the list of working codes into the text field and click on the green button with a check mark.

Remember that codes must be active for you to receive rewards for them. Therefore, we recommend that you redeem them before they expire.

How to Get More Build a Golem Army Codes

If you want to stay up to date with the latest Roblox codes, simply bookmark this page in your browser. We update it regularly so you can get all the rewards. You can also visit the Build a Golem Army developer's social media pages, where they post new codes.

  • Build a Golem Army Roblox game page
  • Build a Golem Army Roblox group
  • Build a Golem Army Discord server

item.title: Roblox: Primeval Earth Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
If you like dinosaurs, then Primeval Earth is the game for you. Primeval Earth allows players to explore the open world as different dinosaurs. And you can choose from a variety of creatures. However, it is worth noting that to unlock most of them, you need to spend Fossils. Therefore, in this guide, we will tell you how to earn extra currency using Primeval Earth codes.

Each of these Roblox codes will reward you with different amounts of Fossils. So, even using several of them, you can unlock new dinosaurs for survival.

Updated August 17, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A couple of new Primeval Earth codes have just been added, giving you more free Fossils to collect. These freebies are a nice way to build up your resources without extra effort. If you’ve already used the older codes, make sure to grab the new ones before they expire. More rewards may arrive in upcoming updates, so keep checking back for the latest additions.

All Primeval Earth Codes

Working Primeval Earth Codes

  • arge - Redeem this code to get free Fossils (NEW)
  • Mosa - Redeem this code to get free Fossils (NEW)
  • rohsal - Redeem this code to get free Fossils
  • fera - Redeem this code to get free Fossils

Expired Primeval Earth Codes

  • 2kfollowers - Redeem this code to get free Fossils
  • 5kmembers - Redeem this code to get free Fossils
  • pachy - Redeem this code to get free Fossils
  • 4kmembers - Redeem this code to get free Fossils
  • river - Redeem this code to get free Fossils

Survival on Primeval Earth is quite a challenging task. Depending on the dinosaur you choose, you will need to get different types of food, such as hunting other dinosaurs or looking for plants. In addition, the abilities of each creature are different, so you should try them all to find a dinosaur that suits your playstyle. Unfortunately, this requires investing quite a lot of Fossils. And if you do not want to spend time earning them, then you should pay attention to Primeval Earth codes.

These codes grant players free Fossils. You will only need to make a couple of clicks to do this. However, we recommend not delaying their use, as they have a limited validity period.

How to Redeem Primeval Earth Codes

The code redemption option in Primeval Earth works quite simply. It is no different from most other Roblox experiences and is available from the first minutes of the game. Just follow these simple steps:

  • First, launch Primeval Earth.
  • Next, click on the gift icon in the main menu.
  • After that, enter the code in the appropriate field.
  • Finally, click the Confirm button to get your free goodies if the code hasn't expired.

How to Get More Primeval Earth Codes

To avoid missing out on fresh Primeval Earth codes, you'll want to bookmark this guide. We'll be updating it over time, like our other Roblox codes articles. Alternatively, players can check out the official developer pages. There you'll find all the news and codes first-hand:

  • TEA - Studios Roblox group
  • Primeval Earth Discord server
  • Primeval Earth X page

item.title: Best Metroidvania Games That Deserved Better
item.description:
Summary

  • Valdis Story: Abyssal City offers rich RPG elements and combo-heavy combat, but struggled to gain widespread attention due to lack of marketing.
  • Kharon’s Crypt pays tribute to Game Boy Color aesthetics with a unique possession mechanic, overlooked by many for its retro visuals.
  • Astalon: Tears of the Earth features crispy movement and unique exploration but was overshadowed by visually elaborate Metroidvanias, despite critical acclaim.

The Metroidvania, as a genre, has enjoyed enormous growth over the past decade, yet many standout titles have been left out of the limelight. Whether due to unfortunate release timing, modest marketing, or being overshadowed by larger releases, some games never reached the audience they warranted.

But a lack of mainstream buzz doesn't necessarily mean a lack of quality. Some of the best games in the genre are hidden away behind industry titans and flashy new releases, just waiting to be discovered. These titles deserve recognition for their innovative designs, unique gameplay approaches, and overall ambition.

Valdis Story: Abyssal City

RPG Elements With Platforming Goodness

3 Images
3 Images
Valdis Story: Abyssal City
Action
Indie
RPG
Systems
Released
September 8, 2013

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Developer(s)
Endlessfluff Games
Platform(s)
Windows, macOS
Powered by

Blending intense, combo-heavy combat with a rich RPG progression system, Valdis Story offers a large amount of replayability through multiple playable characters, unique skill trees, and branching upgrades. Yet despite critical praise, it struggled to distinguish itself during the surge of early indie releases on Steam Greenlight.

Without strong marketing or a major publisher, the game has remained a cult favorite rather than a breakout success. Today, it’s remembered by those who played it as a near-perfect blend of fast action and thoughtful exploration.

Kharon’s Crypt

A Good Old-Fashioned Nostalgia Kick

  • Release Date : Feb 1, 2022
  • Developer: Hebi Lee
  • Available Platforms: Switch, PC

Kharon’s Crypt pays loving tribute to Game Boy Color aesthetics, but expertly pairs its retro visuals with a clever possession mechanic. As a wandering soul, players can inhabit enemies and objects, using them to solve puzzles, bypass hazards, and uncover secrets in a way that was unique to the genre.

Upon release, it saw little attention outside of retro-focused communities. Many dismissed its visuals as a simple throwback, missing its inventive approach to exploration. But for those who gave it time, it revealed itself as a modern game hiding under a nostalgic skin, full of charm, challenge, and surprises.

Astalon: Tears of the Earth

Crispy Movement Across Several Captivating Characters

Astalon: Tears of the Earth
Released
June 3, 2021
Platform(s)
PC, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, Xbox Series X
Powered by

With three heroes to switch between at any time, Astalon: Tears of the Earth encourages experimentation in a world that demands to be explored. Its NES-inspired visuals masked a wealth of modern conveniences and clever level design that made backtracking enjoyable rather than tedious.

Despite the innovative approach, it was kept in the dark by more visually elaborate Metroidvanias. While it did win PC Gamer’s Best Metroidvania award the year it released, the recognition never translated to widespread popularity. Yet, it still stands as a rewarding Metroidvania that honors retro sensibilities without being bound by them.

Ghost Song

Haunting Elegance Below A Rough Exterior

Ghost Song
Action
Adventure
Systems
Released
November 3, 2022

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
T For Teen Due To Blood and Gore, Partial Nudity, Violence
Developer(s)
Old Moon
Platform(s)
Switch, PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by

Set on a mysterious alien moon, Ghost Song combines atmospheric exploration with melancholic storytelling in a hand-painted world unlike any other. The haunting soundtrack lends it a meditative tone, but it isn't afraid to break the slowness with some intense combat that demands precision and timing, like any good Metroidvania.

After a lengthy development, Ghost Song arrived alongside a crowded lineup of sci-fi games and went largely unnoticed. However, those who explored its quiet, lonely corridors found an emotionally resonant adventure that valued mood as much as mechanics. It is well worth picking up for fans of a more psychologically oriented journey.

Catmaze

Fairy Tales Meet Slavic Myths

  • Release Date : May 24, 2018
  • Available Platforms : PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Android
  • Developers : Red Black Spade, Ratalaika Games, indigo game production

Drawing heavily from Slavic mythology, Catmaze presents a whimsical yet mysterious world full of magical creatures and folklore-inspired bosses. Its hand-drawn art and personal story create a warm, distinctive identity, coupled with a cartoony look that sets it apart from the crowd in a big way.

Launched in 2018 by a solo developer, it lacked the promotional reach to stand out. Its lighter tone and gentle difficulty did make it stand out from the darker trends in Metroidvania design, but that made it easy to overlook at the time, despite being a charming, heartfelt take on the genre’s core principles.

Depths of Sanity

Entering The Depths Below

  • Release Date : Nov 2, 2022
  • Developer: Bomb Shelter Games
  • Available Platforms: Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Microsoft Windows, Xbox One

Depths of Sanity takes the unusual approach of setting its entire adventure in a submarine, trading traditional platforming for claustrophobic navigation through underwater caverns. The slower movement adds tension, as each new ability opens routes deeper into unknown waters, and makes the world seem much larger than it initially appears.

Its niche concept and measured pace kept it from appealing to the broader Metroidvania audience. Yet for those willing to adapt, it offers a uniquely atmospheric journey, blending exploration with quiet horror to deliver a unique experience in one of the more crowded gaming spaces.

​​​

Bone Appetit

Simplistic Yet Full Of Life

  • Release Date : May 8, 2020
  • Developer: DXF Games
  • Available Platforms: PC

Mixing absurd humor with classic Metroidvania design, Bone Appetit stands out for its playful premise. Players battle enemies and collect bizarre ingredients to craft meals that grant abilities and powers to be used at various points.

Its creativity shines through in both level design and world-building, but unfortunately, its intentionally silly tone and modest art style led some to underestimate it. Despite the exterior, however, it is still a cleverly structured Metroidvania that rewards curiosity and experimentation, whilst managing to deliver a few laughs along the way.

Environmental Station Alpha

Minimalism At Its Finest

  • Release Date : Apr 23, 2015
  • Developers : Hempuli, Roope Mäkinen, Arvi Teikari
  • Available Platforms : Linux, Microsoft Windows, macOS

Environmental Station Alpha embraces a minimalist pixel-art style while delivering intricate exploration and tight, challenging combat. It demands observation and skill at all times, while presenting players with meaningful secrets hidden throughout its alien environments.

But that stripped-back presentation and lack of hand-holding kept it niche, appealing mostly to hardcore fans. However, its well-executed mechanics and sense of mystery have earned it a devoted following over time. Even today, it offers a masterclass in subtle, yet rewarding design.

item.title: Roblox: Stick Battles Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Stick Battles Codes
  • How to Redeem Stick Battles Codes
  • How to Get More Stick Battles Codes

Stick Battles offers players a battleground experience with quite varied gameplay. Although at first glance it may seem that you just need to skewer your enemies, you will have to use different strategies to survive. And for this, players will need weapons, of which there are quite a few in the game. Therefore, in this guide, we will tell you about Stick Battles codes that will help you earn extra money.

As expected from Roblox codes, they grant players valuable goodies from the developers. This includes money needed to buy new sticks.

Updated August 17, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A fresh set of codes is available for Stick Battles , offering rewards like C$ and the Sticky Stick item. The latest additions give you multiple ways to boost your resources and enhance gameplay. You can redeem these codes to get extra credits or protective shields. Keep an eye on this guide, as new codes may be added in the future.

All Stick Battles Codes

Working Stick Battles Codes

  • secondchance - Redeem this code to get 10 C$ (NEW)
  • roll - Redeem this code to get 200 C$ (NEW)
  • omaoma - Redeem this code to get Sticky Stick (NEW)
  • flabubu - Redeem this code to get 250 C$
  • savemystreak - Redeem this code to get 1 Shield
  • freeshield - Redeem this code to get 1 Shield
  • freecredits - Redeem this code to get 250 C$
  • stick4life - Redeem this code to get 200 C$

Expired Stick Battles Codes

  • THANKYOU500 - Redeem this code to get 150 C$

To survive in Stick Battles , it is not enough for you to just run around the field and attack other enemies. In the first few attempts, you will quickly realize the uselessness of the starting weapon. Therefore, you will have to save money to buy a stick with abilities. Some of them will help you avoid damage, while others are more suitable for attack. However, in any case, they are quite expensive. Fortunately, there is a way to quickly earn money using Stick Battles codes.

Even a few of these codes will be enough for you to earn several hundred C$. But it is worth noting that they have a limited period of activity. If you do not have time to use them before the expiration, the rewards will no longer be available to you.

How to Redeem Stick Battles Codes

Using codes in Stick Battles is no different from most other Roblox experiences. All you need to do is a few clicks to get free goodies from the developers. But if this is your first time playing, just follow these steps:

  • Launch Stick Battles codes
  • Click the Cod button on the left side of the screen.
  • After that, enter the code in the new window and click the Redeem button.

How to Get More Stick Battles Codes

As with most other Roblox games, Stick Battles gets new codes when players reach certain community milestones. So, to avoid missing out on fresh free goodies, you should visit the official developer pages. There, they post all the news about the game, upcoming updates, and much more:

  • TRALALERO MEME Roblox group
  • Stick Battles Discord server
